projects.description: Create administrative side to a web app that can help manage client meetings and projects
Create a form that can read client input data and store it in a database
Sign in page should effectively compare database table data to client login inputs to authorize client sign-in details
A client and an admin should have access to shedule meetings and view the plans and details in their dashboard
Before submission, proper review of functionality, output testing, screenshots, and consolidation must be done
